snippet: Track and field’s governing body said it was investigating 17 suspected doping cases uncovered by the biological passport program, which monitors the blood profiles of athletes.
lead_paragraph: Track and field’s governing body said it was investigating 17 suspected doping cases uncovered by the biological passport program, which monitors the blood profiles of athletes.

headline.main: Biological Passports Lead to Doping Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Biological Passports Lead to Doping Inquiry
